title: New client bug
body: So i installed league and then somehow the new update for the 2017 client wont appear and i am stuck with the legacy one, how do i change to the new one?

replies.body: The install should be for the legacy client, and you'll have to grab the update after that's finished.  You should be able to install the updated client through the legacy's patcher.  When the patcher loads up, you'll see an option to install the open beta.  Let me know if that clears things up!
